messages.subject: Guru predicts demise of corporations
messages.msgSnippet: Woo hoo! This is a great forecast if you ask me.  Just like communism did, corporate capitalism will probably collapse under its own weight. John ... still
messages.messageBody:
Woo hoo!

This is a great forecast if you ask me. Just like communism did, corporate
capitalism will probably collapse under its own weight.

John

From the article:

>>As for his view on the demise of corporations, Drucker says people will
still work for a living but will not cast their lives with a single company.
What Drucker calls the knowledge workers of today will save their best
efforts for non-profit social service organizations, where they can make a
bigger difference. "The 20th century was the century of business," he said.
"The next century is going to be the century of the social sector."<<

http://www.azcentral.com/business/1121drucker21.shtml
